titles.title: Now Praise We Christ, the Holy One
Jesus We Now Must Laud and Sing, From East to West

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Now praise we Christ, the Holy One, The spotless virgin Mary's Son, Far as the bless√©d sun doth shine E'en to the world's remote confine

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He, who Himself all things did make, A servant's form vouchsafed to take, That He as man mankind might win, And save His creatures from their sin.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The grace of God, th'Almighty Lord, On the chaste mother was outpoured a virgin pure and undefiled In wondrous wise conceived a child.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: The holy maid became th'abode And temple of the living God; And she, who knew not man, was blest With God's own Word made manifest.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The noble mother bare a Son, For so did Gabriel's promise run, Whom John confessed and leapt with joy, Ere yet the mother knew her boy.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
In a rude manger, stretched on hay, In poverty content He lay;
With milk was fed the Lord of all, Who feeds the ravens when they call.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Th' angelic choir rejoice, and raise Their voice to God in songs of praise;
To humble shepherds is proclaimed The Shepherd who the world hath framed.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Honor to Thee, O Christ, be paid, Pure offspring of a holy maid,
With Father and with Holy Ghost, Till time in time's abyss be lost.
